Sentencas: The main aim of this research is to investigate the performance of ammonia-powered microtubular solid oxide fuel cells in order to use ammonia as a possible candidate for eco-friendly and sustainable power generation systems.
Titulo: Three-dimensional numerical simulation and experimental validation on ammonia and hydrogen fueled micro tubular solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: The performance of a direct ammonia-powered cell has been elucidated and validated with the experimental results of pure hydrogen gas at Nigde Omer Halisdemir University Prof. T. Nejat Veziroglu Clean Energy Research Center.
Titulo: Three-dimensional numerical simulation and experimental validation on ammonia and hydrogen fueled micro tubular solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: For both studies, the cathode electrode is supplied with atmospheric air.
Titulo: Three-dimensional numerical simulation and experimental validation on ammonia and hydrogen fueled micro tubular solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: The performance of anode, electrolyte, and cathode-supported microtubular solid oxide fuel cells has been compared numerically.
Titulo: Three-dimensional numerical simulation and experimental validation on ammonia and hydrogen fueled micro tubular solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: The findings confirmed that the peak possible power densities obtained numerically using direct ammonia, hydrogen and experimentally using pure hydrogen gas are is 628.92 mW/cm(2), 622.29 mW/cm(2)' and, 589.28 mW/cm(2) respectively at the same geometrical dimensions, component materials, and operating parameters.
Titulo: Three-dimensional numerical simulation and experimental validation on ammonia and hydrogen fueled micro tubular solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: Thus, the results of this study demonstrate that simultaneous experimental and numerical studies make a great contribution to minimizing biases due to literature data during model validation.
Titulo: Three-dimensional numerical simulation and experimental validation on ammonia and hydrogen fueled micro tubular solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: The numerical simulation also indicates that the performance of cathode supported is superior to that of anode supported cells run with hydrogen and ammonia fuel.
Titulo: Three-dimensional numerical simulation and experimental validation on ammonia and hydrogen fueled micro tubular solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: Likewise, parametric sweep analysis asserts that the working temperature has a greater effect than operating pressure on tubular cell performance.
Titulo: Three-dimensional numerical simulation and experimental validation on ammonia and hydrogen fueled micro tubular solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: Therefore, the results of this study advise that ammonia will become a carbon-free alter- native fuel for solid oxide fuel cells in the coming years.
Titulo: Three-dimensional numerical simulation and experimental validation on ammonia and hydrogen fueled micro tubular solid oxide fuel cell performance
